full_text:
Re: Federal prison suicides rising before Jeffrey Epstein's death
From Hugh Hurwitz
To (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/08/25 08:28
Subject: Re: Federal prison suicides rising before Jeffrey Epstein's death
Attachments: TEXT.htm
(b)(5), (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Thanks!
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Date: 8/24/19 2:49 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Cc (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Federal prison suicides rising before Jeffrey Epstein's death
>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 08/24/2019 14:49 >>>
Hugh,
1. The attached spreadsheet has three tabs with counts on Attempts, Self Harm and Placement on Suicide Watch for all of our institutions between 2014-2018 and it was shared with IPPA.
2. This is a reporter's question sent to IPPA along with our response and my recommendation for adding more information.
(4) Also, does BOP have any special initiatives under way to help reduce the numbers? What is BOP's response to the union's contention is staffing shortages is at the root of the problem?
Page 7448
DOJ-OGR-00024422

text_blocks.content:
Re: Federal prison suicides rising before Jeffrey Epstein's death
From Hugh Hurwitz
To (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/08/25 08:28
Subject: Re: Federal prison suicides rising before Jeffrey Epstein's death
Attachments: TEXT.htm

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
-------- Original message --------
From (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Date: 8/24/19 2:49 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Cc (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov
Subject: Re: Federal prison suicides rising before Jeffrey Epstein's death

1. The attached spreadsheet has three tabs with counts on Attempts, Self Harm and Placement on Suicide Watch for all of our institutions between 2014-2018 and it was shared with IPPA.
2. This is a reporter's question sent to IPPA along with our response and my recommendation for adding more information.
(4) Also, does BOP have any special initiatives under way to help reduce the numbers? What is BOP's response to the union's contention is staffing shortages is at the root of the problem?

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(5), (b)(6), (b)(7)(C), indicating sensitive information has been removed for privacy or security reasons.
